entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 2:55AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Prolonged Arctic Blast Late Weekend Into Early Next Week... A mid-winter arctic front is coming this weekend with seasonably cold temperatures lasting well into next week. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 12:49PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ... Areas of Falling and Blowing Snow Expected Thursday into Early Saturday... West to northwest winds will increase along the North Slope late tonight into early Saturday morning, with a forecast for between 3 to 5 inches of snow expected. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 3:11PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...DANGEROUS ROAD CONDITIONS WILL PERSIST INTO SUNDAY MORNING... Lingering frozen precipitation on area roads and temperatures below freezing will continue to result in black ice across the area through Sunday morning. Extreme caution should be exercised if you must travel. Please check local road conditions first if you must absolutely travel.
